g.text: Create CO (SRAM post new CO API)
Add researcher to group (SRAM join request)
Invitation mail with SRAM CO self-invite link
Redirect to IdP (Request to join CO)
Invite user CO (SRAM collaboration invite API)
Redirect to IdP (Log in to accept the invite)
Change role of researcher in group
Change role of researcher in CO (SRAM update CO membership API)
Role of researcher changed in group
Remove user from CO (SRAM delete CO membership API)
